name: Propulsion 2D
description:
A fast-paced 2D platformer inspired by minimalism where the player must confront a variety of obstacles with their rocket launcher, which can also launch them quickly in any direction to race through levels and get the fastest times possible in a wide variety of challenging levels.

Features:

80 unique levels 

A wide variety of challenges and obstacles

Controller support (Xbox and Playstation with DS4Windows)

Windows support (also available on Xbox)
